# Ed Cork | Technical Writing Portfolio
> High-level summary of professional experience, projects, and technical documentation samples.

## Professional Profile
Lead technical writer with over a decade of experience in the software industry. Specializes in information architecture and content strategy for complex enterprise software.

## Core Expertise
- **Information Architecture:** Restructuring high-volume documentation sets to improve discoverability.
- **Tools:** MediaWiki, Confluence, MadCap Flare, XMetaL, Subversion, and GitHub.
- **Strategy:** Content audits, ToC optimization, and cross-functional documentation leadership.

## Portfolio Highlights

### 1. Help Center Restructuring & Information Architecture
A large-scale project focused on reducing user friction by streamlining content volume.
- **Outcome:** Reduced total topic count by over 50% (from 491 to 241).
- **Optimization:** Collapsed deep hierarchy from 6 levels down to 3 to improve navigation speed.
- **Focus:** Information design, content consolidation, and user experience.

### 2. Technical Writing Samples
- **Install OMT:** Comprehensive installation guides for complex software suites.

### 3. Technical Editing Samples
- **Kubernetes Troubleshooting:** Procedural documentation and error-state resolution guides.

## Contact & Links
- **Portfolio Home:** https://edcork.github.io/
- **GitHub Profile:** https://github.com/edcork
- **LinkedIn:** https://www.linkedin.com/in/edwardcork/
